title: Emergency in Africa
brief_description: A documentary that looks at the emergency situation that exists in Africa. There is not enough food being produced to feed the people and a great proportion of the population, especially the children, suffer from disease and malnutrition. This film examines the type of relief that is being provided by the UNICEF organisation.
